ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Chains Reliability
ygData.msgSnippet: Warning: Also let the ranger snare or do Chains if you have a druid as your primary healer. It is VERY difficult to know when to snare when you are seated
ygData.messageBody:
Warning: Also let the ranger snare or do Chains if you have a druid
as your primary healer. It is VERY difficult to know when to snare
when you are seated looking at your spellbook! :)
